get.description: Return the list of document from a store

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the registered query to load

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the registered query to load

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Order by fields, separated by a coma

parameters.name: partialkey
parameters.description: Filter the entries by a partial key

parameters.name: startkey
parameters.description: Filter the entries starting from a key

parameters.name: excludestart
parameters.description: Exclude the entries exactly matching the start key

parameters.name: endkey
parameters.description: Filter the entries up to key

parameters.name: excludeend
parameters.description: Exclude the entries matching exactly the end key

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of entries returned

parameters.name: hierarchical
parameters.description: Indicates that the entries should be returned hierarchically up to a certain level

parameters.name: options
parameters.description:
Defines the options used when executing the query:
1: Insert the category #1
2: Insert the category #2
4: Insert the category #3
8: Insert the category #4
32: Makes the entry value the document content
256: returns the read marks as part of the entries
4096: Calculate the hierarchy manually (not advised)
8192: Sort the collection by the Full Text rank
16384: Do not use SQL to filter the entries (not advised)

parameters.name: transformer
parameters.description: Transformation of the resulting JSON document

parameters.name: jsontree
parameters.description: Return the response entries as a children property in the JSON resultset.

get.description: Export the list of entries in a store

parameters.description: Format of the export: csv, text, html or ms-excel

parameters.description: List of columns to display, separated by a coma

parameters.name: titles
parameters.description: Title of columns to display, separated by a coma. 'true' forces the titles to the column names
